subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Reuniting was the easy part for Chauncey Billups, Amar’e Stoudemire and Carmelo Anthony. Staying together, at least for any meaningful span, proved much more challenging.
snippet: Reuniting was the easy part for Chauncey Billups, Amar’e Stoudemire and Carmelo Anthony. Staying together, at least for any meaningful span, proved much more challenging.
